title: Calculate cross-price elasticity from P, Q data

content.question: If a <math alttext="10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> percent increase in the price of good X results in a <math alttext="20" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>20</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> percent decrease in the quantity of good Y demanded, which of the following is true?
